text: Pervaiz may refer to: *Ansar Pervaiz, Pakistani nuclear scientist, nuclear technologist and the current chairman of the Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission *Chaudhry Pervaiz Elahi (born 1945), Pakistani politician *Dildar Pervaiz Bhatti, Pakistani television and radio host and announcer *Pervaiz Iqbal Cheema (born 1940), scholar of International Relations and Strategic Studies from Pakistan *Pervaiz Kaleem, Pakistani film director and writer based in Lahore *Raja Pervaiz Ashraf (born 1950), Prime Minister of Pakistan and Pakistan Peoples Party politician
title: Pervaiz
